instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3787: What is 820-3787? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.SMBUS_SMC_0_S0_SDA: What is SMBUS_SMC_0_S0_SDA? SMBUS_SMC_0_S0_SDA is a data line between the system management controller(SMC), temperature sensors, GPU, and ALS(ambient light sensor). If this line is pulled down the machine may run slow or have the fans run fast all the time because the SMC canâ€™t tell what the temperature of parts of the machine like fin stack are. Usual problem is bad webcam, unplug webcam to see if it fixes problem. .

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3787</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Fan goes high and laggish after 10 secs. Left Fin Stack Proximity failed in ASD test
threads.message:
Hi all,

This is not a liquid dmg board.
Fan goes high and laggish. ASD test failed with Left Fin Stack Proximity.

<SIGNAL>SMBUS_SMC_0_S0_SDA</SIGNAL> AND SCL CLEAR 3.3V. <SIGNAL>GPUTHMSNS_THM_L</SIGNAL> IS 3.3V.

Missing <SIGNAL>GPUTHMSNS_ALERT_L</SIGNAL>. 0V.
I replaced <TRANSISTOR>Q5801</TRANSISTOR>,<TRANSISTOR>Q5803</TRANSISTOR>, <CHIP>U5850</CHIP> still no luck.  DATA sheet says it requirs a pull up resistor to get the voltage.

Any idea?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3787</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Fan goes high and laggish after 10 secs. Left Fin Stack Proximity failed in ASD test
threads.message: Try first disconnecting webcam.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3787</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Fan goes high and laggish after 10 secs. Left Fin Stack Proximity failed in ASD test
threads.message: I did. No webcam, No wifi. Replaced the SMC same issue.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3787</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Fan goes high and laggish after 10 secs. Left Fin Stack Proximity failed in ASD test
threads.message: Check traces from <TRANSISTOR>Q5801</TRANSISTOR>/03 to <CHIP>U5850</CHIP>.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3787</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Fan goes high and laggish after 10 secs. Left Fin Stack Proximity failed in ASD test
threads.message: connectivity between <TRANSISTOR>Q5801</TRANSISTOR>, <TRANSISTOR>Q5803</TRANSISTOR>, <CAPACITOR>C5852</CAPACITOR> are present. Diode mode I get around 0.6XX V. voltage on <CAPACITOR>C5852</CAPACITOR> i get 0.5v on ipin 1 and 0.1v in pin 2.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3787</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Fan goes high and laggish after 10 secs. Left Fin Stack Proximity failed in ASD test
threads.message: I already replaced the <CAPACITOR>C5852</CAPACITOR> still no luck.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3787</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Fan goes high and laggish after 10 secs. Left Fin Stack Proximity failed in ASD test
threads.message:
Check voltage and diode mode on SCL/SDA lines of <CHIP>U5850</CHIP>.
Also test the machine removing <CHIP>U5850</CHIP>.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3787</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Fan goes high and laggish after 10 secs. Left Fin Stack Proximity failed in ASD test
threads.message: SCL/SDA Voltage is 3.3V. Diode 0.652V both lines. Remove <CHIP>U5850</CHIP> I get missing <SIGNAL>GPUTHMSNS_ALERT_L</SIGNAL>. 3.3v.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3787</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Fan goes high and laggish after 10 secs. Left Fin Stack Proximity failed in ASD test
threads.message: removing <CHIP>U5850</CHIP> still fan high.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3787</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Fan goes high and laggish after 10 secs. Left Fin Stack Proximity failed in ASD test
threads.message: What errors appear on ASD, running without <CHIP>U5850</CHIP>?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3787</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Fan goes high and laggish after 10 secs. Left Fin Stack Proximity failed in ASD test
threads.message:
ASD FAILED WITH OUT <CHIP>U5850</CHIP> and those are,
(TG0D)- GPU-Die Anolong (test 1)
(TG0P-GPU Proximity
(Th1H) Right FinStack
(Th2H) Left Fin Stack

Other than these 4 all passed.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3787</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Fan goes high and laggish after 10 secs. Left Fin Stack Proximity failed in ASD test
threads.message: With <CHIP>U5850</CHIP> Only (Th2H0 Left Fin Stack Failed.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3787</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Fan goes high and laggish after 10 secs. Left Fin Stack Proximity failed in ASD test
threads.message: I mean (Th2H)

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3787</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Fan goes high and laggish after 10 secs. Left Fin Stack Proximity failed in ASD test
threads.message:
So <CHIP>U5850</CHIP> works and it only receives bad signal from <TRANSISTOR>Q5801</TRANSISTOR>.
Interchange <TRANSISTOR>Q5801</TRANSISTOR>/03 and see what happens.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3787</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Fan goes high and laggish after 10 secs. Left Fin Stack Proximity failed in ASD test
threads.message: Interchange <TRANSISTOR>Q5801</TRANSISTOR>/03 no lcuk. Replaced again <TRANSISTOR>Q5801</TRANSISTOR>/03/<CAPACITOR>C5852</CAPACITOR>. Still no luck. Removing <TRANSISTOR>Q5801</TRANSISTOR>/03 I get 1.5V in <TRANSISTOR>Q5803</TRANSISTOR> pic1,3.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3787</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Fan goes high and laggish after 10 secs. Left Fin Stack Proximity failed in ASD test
threads.message: When interchanged transistors, same sensor error reported?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3787</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Fan goes high and laggish after 10 secs. Left Fin Stack Proximity failed in ASD test
threads.message: wiredly yes. And thats why i replace both <TRANSISTOR>Q5801</TRANSISTOR>/03. still same left fin stack failed.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3787</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Fan goes high and laggish after 10 secs. Left Fin Stack Proximity failed in ASD test
threads.message: I checked the connectivity again between <TRANSISTOR>Q5801</TRANSISTOR>/03/U 5850, <CAPACITOR>C5852</CAPACITOR> and they are all connected.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3787</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Fan goes high and laggish after 10 secs. Left Fin Stack Proximity failed in ASD test
threads.message: And still missing missing <SIGNAL>GPUTHMSNS_ALERT_L</SIGNAL>.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3787</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Fan goes high and laggish after 10 secs. Left Fin Stack Proximity failed in ASD test
threads.message: Also <CHIP>U5850</CHIP> Pin 4, I get 0.4 to 0.5V and pin 5 0.124v

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3787</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Fan goes high and laggish after 10 secs. Left Fin Stack Proximity failed in ASD test
threads.message:
<RESISTOR>R5852</RESISTOR> is good?
Any chance to compare voltages and diode mode readings with good board?
